bug.short_desc: Recoll advanced search does not work
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: After a recoll database has been successfully created, start the recoll gui, go to Tools menu - Advanced search. Enter some search terms, click 'Start search', nothing happens.
This bug is supposedly fixed in Recoll 1.22.4. See this for notes about this issue being fixed. https://www.lesbonscomptes.com/recoll/release-1.22.html
Please update recoll in Fedora 25 to 1.22.4.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): Name : recoll Arch : x86_64 Epoch : 0 Version : 1.22.3 Release : 1.fc25
recoll-1.22.4-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7ea839052e
recoll-1.22.4-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-ea2f7d026d

recoll-1.22.4-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7ea839052e
